name: Tell Me If It's Fun
description: Originally began as my thesis project but I have some ideas I'd really enjoy developing further. People are so beautiful and in this game you can watch the way they move about the room. New rooms will be added for the inhabitants over the course of the next year - they'll be smarter and fitter and won't be afraid to say what's on their mind. Some of these rooms will be ornate, others circular, a few rectangular ones with high ceilings, floors of water.
